remarks: Lemma for ~ stoweid .  This lemma is used by Lemma 1 in [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 90; the key step uses Bernoulli's inequality ~ bernneq .  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
statement:
stoweidlem1.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) $.
stoweidlem1.2 $e |- ( ph -> K e. NN ) $.
stoweidlem1.3 $e |- ( ph -> D e. RR+ ) $.
stoweidlem1.5 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR+ ) $.
stoweidlem1.6 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
stoweidlem1.7 $e |- ( ph -> A <_ 1 ) $.
stoweidlem1.8 $e |- ( ph -> D <_ A ) $.
stoweidlem1 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( 1 - ( A ^ N ) ) ^ ( K ^ N ) ) <_ ( 1 / ( ( K x. D ) ^ N ) ) ) $.
